public class Fourthpower {

	public static void main(String[] args) {
		int n=6;
		int square;
		square=n*n;
		System.out.println("square " +square);
		int cube=n*n*n;
		System.out.println("cube " +cube);
		int fourth=n*n*n*n;
		System.out.println("fourth " +fourth);
		// TODO Auto-generated method stub

	}

}
